feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [BHS/GRA][Managed Services] - Logs Data Platform maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 17, 12:00 - 16:00 UTC

Jul 18, 19:03 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our Logs Data Platform offering.

Start time : 17/09/2025 12:00 UTC
End time : 17/09/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : The public API of Logs Data Platform product will be on read only mode during the whole maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on Logs Data Platform offering.
For more information about IAM for Logs Data Platform, you can visit this documentation: KB0071667

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [BHS7][Dedicated Servers] - Rack B717B01
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 19, 10:00 - 12:00 UTC

Jul 29, 19:02 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.
Start time: 19/08/2025 10:00 UTC
End time: 19/08/2025 12:00 UTC
Service impact: Public and private networks will be unavailable during maintenance.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [BHS8][Key Management Service] - Rack BHS0817A03A
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 13, 11:00 - 19:30 UTC

Jul 16, 20:48 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure.

Start time : 13/08/2025 11:00 UTC
End time : 13/08/2025 19:30 UTC
Service impact : The cooling system's efficiency could be temporarily impacted for some servers, which could cause a decreased performance during this maintenance.
Related maintenance : https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/prc0d4t6hkh7
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX2][Dedicated Servers] - Maintenance notification - Rack 21C04
entry.content:

Jul 29, 23:31 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offering in RBX1.

entry.title: [SBG8][Virtual Private Servers] - Network equipment maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 5, 12:00 - 13:30 UTC

Jul 31, 15:01 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our network infrastructure in the VPS region SBG8.

Start time : 05/08/2025 12:00 UTC
End time : 05/08/2025 13:30 UTC
Service impact : The network of all VPS located in the region SBG8 will observe up to 2 seconds of packet loss. The packet loss will happen once per service during the maintenance window.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our network infrastructure.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [LIM3][Dedicated Servers] - Rack LIM0303A04B incident notification
entry.content:
Aug 1, 14:32 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Dedicated Servers offer on the specific rack.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 01/08/2025 13:53 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Public network is temporarily unavailable for servers in rack LIM0303A04B.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access and use their servers located in the specified rack through public network.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a network equipment issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

entry.title: [GRA3][Dedicated Servers] - Multiple racks incident notification
entry.content:
Aug 1, 09:34 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our Dedicated Servers offer on racks GRA0321A03A/B/C in GRA3.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 01/08/2025 06:21 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some servers in the specified racks are currently unreachable.
Customers Impact : Some customers are currently unable to access their servers located in the specified racks.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by an issue with the cooling system.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Aug 1, 06:40 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our Dedicated Servers offering, which is causing temporary availability issues on racks GRA0321A03A/B/C in the GRA3.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 01/08/2025 06:21 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some servers in the specific racks are unavailable.
Customers Impact : Some customers cannot access or use their servers in the specified racks.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it. 

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX1][Dedicated Servers] - Maintenance notification
entry.content:
Aug 1, 02:06 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jul 28, 18:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jul 8, 22:17 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offering in RBX1.

Start time : 28/07/2025 18:00 UTC
End time : 01/08/2025 02:00 UTC
Service impact : Some servers will be temporarily unavailable for a while during maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our teams will be doing a moving some servers from RBX1 to RBX3.
The customers received a communication from our technical support to inform them of the migration.

Thank you for your understanding.
